original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid dang / bden pa kho na dang / ma nor ba nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa yin no zhes gsungs so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid dang / bden pa kho na dang / ma nor ba nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa yin no zhes gsungs so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: That which is not other, that which is thusness, that which is reality, that which is only true, that which is nonerroneous, and that which is not distorted is the brief indication of the characteristics of dependent origination.

original: de bas na kun rdzob tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi lugs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na kun rdzob tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi lugs zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the mere abiding of dependently originated phenomena in the conventional is called the ‚Äúnature of things.‚Äù

original: shes pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de la gzhan mu stegs can dag gi rgyu med pa dang mi mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i mtshan nyid du brtags pa de lta bu ma yin par
analyzed: shes pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gnas pa nyid gang yin pa de la gzhan mu stegs can dag gi rgyu med pa dang mi mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i mtshan nyid du brtags pa de lta bu ma yin par
translated: The term ‚Äúknowledge‚Äù means that the mere abiding of dependently originated phenomena is not imagined by non-Buddhists to be characterized by causeless arising or arising from incompatible causes.

original: kun rdzob tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid lnga po rgyu dang bcas pa las 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / mi rtag pa'i du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / nus pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid lnga po rgyu dang bcas pa las 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / mi rtag pa'i du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / nus pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
translated: It is the individually discriminating pristine wisdom which thoroughly understands the five characteristics of the relative, which is the system of dependent origination, in accordance with the way they arise from causes, the way they arise from the causes of impermanent multiplicity, the way they arise from the conditions of potency,

original: byed pa med pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa med pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o //
translated: and the way they arise from the conditions of inactivity.

original: brten cing gnas zhes bya ba @89a * //
analyzed: brten cing gnas zhes bya ba @89a * //
translated: ‚ÄúRelying on and abiding‚Äù

original: ni de ltar chos kyi lugs shes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes de la brten cing gnas nas so //
analyzed: ni de ltar chos kyi lugs shes pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes de la brten cing gnas nas so //
translated: means that, having relied on and abided in that individually discriminating pristine wisdom which understands the system of phenomena in that way,

original: de ltar chos kyi lugs shes pa la brten cing gnas nas sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la mkhas pa ni de dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / gnas dang dmigs pa dang / grogs dang / las dang / de'i yod pa nyid la mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi lugs shes pa la brten cing gnas nas sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la mkhas pa ni de dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / gnas dang dmigs pa dang / grogs dang / las dang / de'i yod pa nyid la mkhas pa dang /
translated: Thus, based on and abiding in the knowledge of the Dharma system, the knowledge of the secrets of mind, mentality and consciousness is the knowledge of their nature, their basis, their object, their companion, their function and their existence.üîΩThey are skilled in the presentation of engagement through engagement in objects, engagement through engagement in concomitance, engagement through the condition of one being the one and engagement through the entity of simultaneity.

original: dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pas 'jug pa dang / gcig gi rkyen nyid gcig yin pas 'jug pa dang / lhan cig gi dngos pos 'jug pa dag gis 'jug pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa yin pas na de nyid kun rdzob kyi rab tu dbye ba la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po la mkhas pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pas 'jug pa dang / gcig gi rkyen nyid gcig yin pas 'jug pa dang / lhan cig gi dngos pos 'jug pa dag gis 'jug pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa yin pas na de nyid kun rdzob kyi rab tu dbye ba la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po la mkhas pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, they are skilled in the antidote to the extreme confusion about the classification of the conventional.

original: des ni sngar 'phags pa blo gros yangs pas ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la mkhas pa lags zhes zhus pa'i lan btab pa yin te ;
analyzed: des ni sngar 'phags pa blo gros yangs pas ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la mkhas pa lags zhes zhus pa'i lan btab pa yin te ;
translated: ‚ÄúTo what extent is a bodhisattva skilled in the secrets of mind, thought, and consciousness?‚Äù

original: de dag ni chos kyi lugs shes pa'i spyod yul gyi gsang ba la mkhas pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni chos kyi lugs shes pa'i spyod yul gyi gsang ba la mkhas pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the skill in the secret of the domain of knowledge of the system of phenomena.

original: yin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la mkhas par 'dogs na de tsam gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'dogs so zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos kyi lugs shes pa'i spyod yul
analyzed: yin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la mkhas par 'dogs na de tsam gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'dogs so zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos kyi lugs shes pa'i spyod yul
translated: ‚ÄúEven though that is so, if the TathƒÅgata were to designate a bodhisattva as skilled in the secrets of mind, thought, and consciousness, he would not do so on the basis of just that alone.‚Äù

original: gyi gsang ba la mkhas pa yang 'jug pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: gyi gsang ba la mkhas pa yang 'jug pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa yin mod kyi /
translated: This shows that although skill in the domain of knowledge of the system of phenomena is skill in the presentation of engagement,

original: ldog pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa ma yin pas de tsam la mkhas par mi 'dogs kyi ldog pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa la ni mkhas par 'dogs so zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'i mig 'dren pa yin te /üîΩde la kun rdzob kyi rab tu dbye ba la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen por bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: ldog pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa ma yin pas de tsam la mkhas par mi 'dogs kyi ldog pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa la ni mkhas par 'dogs so zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'i mig 'dren pa yin te / de la kun rdzob kyi rab tu dbye ba la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen por bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one who is not skilled in positing the reversal of the conventional is not called skilled in that much, but one who is skilled in positing the reversal of the conventional is called skilled in that much.üîΩThe explanation of the meaning of the words of the teaching as an antidote to the extreme confusion about the classification of the conventional should be explained.

original: don dam pa'i rab tu dbye ba la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ldog pa rnam par gzhag pas kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pas bsdus pa yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa niüîΩdon dam pa'i rab tu dbye ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i rab tu dbye ba la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ldog pa rnam par gzhag pas kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pas bsdus pa yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa niüîΩdon dam pa'i rab tu dbye ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The explanation of the meaning of the words of the teaching as an antidote to the extreme confusion about the classification of the ultimate should be explained.

original: de mi shes pa'i gnyen por rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam @89b par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi gsang ba bstan pa gang yin pa ni
analyzed: de mi shes pa'i gnyen por rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam @89b par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi gsang ba bstan pa gang yin pa ni
translated: The antidote to the ignorance of that is the teaching of the secret of the domain of nonconceptual wisdom, which is the power of nonconceptual wisdom, since mind, thought, and consciousness are not apprehended.

original: de la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po bstan pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de la shin tu rmongs pa'i gnyen po bstan pa zhes bya ste /
translated: That is called the teaching of the antidote to the extreme confusion about that.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,

original: blo gros yangs pa gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nang gi so so len pa mi mthong zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: blo gros yangs pa gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nang gi so so len pa mi mthong zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúO Vi≈õƒÅlamati, because bodhisattvas do not see internal grasping . . .‚Äù

original: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ldog pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ldog pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the presentation of the cessation of affliction?

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas dge ba'i chos bsgom pas rnam par ldog par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas dge ba'i chos bsgom pas rnam par ldog par rig par bya ste /
translated: Since the ƒÅlaya consciousness is the root of all afflictions, it should be understood that it ceases through cultivating virtuous dharmas.

original: ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it the root of all afflictions?

original: de ni sems can gyi 'jig rten grub par byed pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten grub par byed pa dang / da ltar gyi sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa grub par byed pa dang /üîΩda ltar gyi kun 'byung ba'i bden pa grub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni sems can gyi 'jig rten grub par byed pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten grub par byed pa dang / da ltar gyi sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa grub par byed pa dang / da ltar gyi kun 'byung ba'i bden pa grub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin no //
translated: It is the root of all afflictions because it creates the world of sentient beings, it creates the world of the physical cosmos, it is the reality of the truth of suffering in the present, it creates the truth of suffering in the future, and it creates the truth of origination in the present.üîΩThus, the root of all afflictions is the storehouse consciousness.

original: de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa de ni dge ba'i chos bsgom pas ldog par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa de ni dge ba'i chos bsgom pas ldog par rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that this storehouse consciousness, which is the root of all afflictions, is eliminated by the cultivation of virtuous qualities.

original: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa de yang 'jug pa dang / rtogs pa dang / goms pa dang / yid la byed pa'i gnas rnams su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa de yang 'jug pa dang / rtogs pa dang / goms pa dang / yid la byed pa'i gnas rnams su shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the cultivation of virtuous qualities should be understood in terms of engagement, realization, practice, and mental attention.

original: de la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang po so so'i skye bo'i sa nas bden pa mngon par rtogs pa la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang po so so'i skye bo'i sa nas bden pa mngon par rtogs pa la 'jug pa ste /
translated: Entry is the first entry to the realization of the truths from the level of ordinary beings in order to realize the foundation consciousness.

original: de yang bden pa mthong ba bden pa rnams la mig ma thob pas ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon thams cad pas rtogs par mi nus pas de'i phyir so so'i skye bo sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs
analyzed: de yang bden pa mthong ba bden pa rnams la mig ma thob pas ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon thams cad pas rtogs par mi nus pas de'i phyir so so'i skye bo sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs
translated: Since those who have not obtained the eye of the truth of seeing the truths are unable to realize the seed of the foundation consciousness, in order to stabilize the mind of ordinary beings, they strive with attention focused on the entry consciousness.

original: pa'i yid la byed pas brtson par byed pa na dang bo kho nar rnam par gzhag pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam gyi bsdus pa'i dge ba'i chos bsgom pa ni 'jug pa'i bsgom pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i yid la byed pas brtson par byed pa na dang bo kho nar rnam par gzhag pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam gyi bsdus pa'i dge ba'i chos bsgom pa ni 'jug pa'i bsgom pa yin no //
translated: When they do so, they first cultivate the truths that are established and the truths that are realized in order to enter the path of seeing. This is entry cultivation.

original: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i tshul rtogs par byed pa ste /üîΩde yang de ltar bden pa mngon par rtogs shing nyan thos kyi yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la @90a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i tshul rtogs par byed pa ste / de yang de ltar bden pa mngon par rtogs shing nyan thos kyi yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la @90a * //
translated: Realization is the realization of the mode of the store consciousness.

original: zhugs sam / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs so //
analyzed: zhugs sam / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs so //
translated: Moreover, having thus realized the truth, one enters the faultless state of reality of the disciples or the faultless state of reality of the bodhisattvas.

original: chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byed pa na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byed pa na /
translated: When one realizes the reality realm of all dharmas,

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa sa bon thams cad pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam gyi sbyor bas bsdus pa'i dge pa'i chos bsgom pa ni rtogs pa bsgom pa yin no //üîΩgoms pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa nyid kun du bsten cing lan mang du byed /

analyzed: de la dpe'i dgos pa rnam pa bzhi ni don gyi dpe dang / phyi rol gyi dang / nad gi dpe dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe'o //

original: de la dang por don gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la dang por don gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: First, the meaning of the words of the teaching of the characteristic of the reality of the Dharma, which is endowed with the purpose of the example of the reality, will be explained.

original: de la don gyi dpe zhes bya ba ni nang gi mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa'i mig dngos don zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de la don gyi dpe zhes bya ba ni nang gi mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa'i mig dngos don zhes bya ste /
translated: Here, the so-called example of the reality is the eye that is the actual object, the eye that is impaired by the fault of cataracts.

original: de nyid don gyi dpe'o //
analyzed: de nyid don gyi dpe'o //
translated: That is the example of the reality.

original: dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i chos kyi @98b mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i chos kyi @98b mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The teaching of the characteristic of the reality of the Dharma, which is endowed with the purpose of the example, is the teaching of the characteristic of the imagined reality, which is endowed with the meaning of that example.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, with regard to the teaching of that,

original: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: the one who is a source of good qualities says, ‚ÄúIt is like this.

original: skyes bu gang zag rab rib can gyi mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa de lta bur ni kun du brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: skyes bu gang zag rab rib can gyi mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa de lta bur ni kun du brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Just as the eye of a person who is impaired by cataracts is impaired by the fault of cataracts, so should the imagined characteristic be seen.‚Äù

original: 'dir ni rgyus 'bras bu ston te /
analyzed: 'dir ni rgyus 'bras bu ston te /
translated: Here, the cause is taught by the effect.

original: dper na mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin la /üîΩrgyu des 'khrul par 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu yin pa dang 'dra bar thog ma med pa'i dus na dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags sems 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la glo bur bar gnas pa de ni 'dir mig
analyzed: dper na mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin la / rgyu des 'khrul par 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu yin pa dang 'dra bar thog ma med pa'i dus na dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags sems 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la glo bur bar gnas pa de ni 'dir mig
translated: For example, the eye‚Äôs fault of myodesopsia is the cause of delusion.üîΩThe delusion caused by that cause is the result.

original: la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa dang 'dra bar bstan te /
analyzed: la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa dang 'dra bar bstan te /
translated: In the same way, the latent propensities for the manifest clinging to things as real that exist adventitiously in the beginningless mind that is the cause of delusion, the consciousness of the ground of all, are taught here to be like the eye‚Äôs fault of myodesopsia.

original: de ni sgro 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de ni sgro 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: That is the cause of reification.

original: rgyu des dngos po la ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brdar btags pa dngos po la glo bur bar gnas pa ni 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: rgyu des dngos po la ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brdar btags pa dngos po la glo bur bar gnas pa ni 'bras bu ste /
translated: The result is the adventitious designation of names and attributes to things, either in terms of their nature or in terms of their attributes, caused by that cause.üîΩBoth of those are similar in being the imagined nature.

original: de gnyi ga kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin par 'dra ba las 'bras bu de ni dngos su 'dir ma bstan pas rgyu'i sgo nas shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu bstan to zhes bshad de /
analyzed: de gnyi ga kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin par 'dra ba las 'bras bu de ni dngos su 'dir ma bstan pas rgyu'i sgo nas shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyus 'bras bu bstan to zhes bshad de /
translated: Since the result is not explicitly taught here, it is taught in terms of the cause in order to make it understood.

original: de ni don gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni don gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the imagined nature, which has the purpose of being an example.

original: de'i 'og tu phyi rol gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu phyi rol gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: After that, the explanation of the nature of phenomena, which has the purpose of being an external example, should be explained, such as the meaning of the words.

original: de la phyi rol gyi dpe zhes bya ba ni nang gi mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa'i rgyu de las 'bras bu phyi rol gyi mtshan ma snang ba nyid dpe'o //
analyzed: de la phyi rol gyi dpe zhes bya ba ni nang gi mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa'i rgyu de las 'bras bu phyi rol gyi mtshan ma snang ba nyid dpe'o //
translated: There, the so-called external example is the appearance of external signs, which is the result arising from the cause of the eye being afflicted by the fault of cataracts.

original: dpe de'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dpe de'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The explanation of the nature of phenomena, which has the purpose of being an example, is the explanation of the nature of the dependent phenomenon, which has the meaning of that example.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on that explanation,üîΩit is said:

original: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: O, those who are the source of good qualities, it is like this.

original: de nyid la rab rib kyi mtshan ma skra shad 'dzings pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma snang bar gyur pa de lta bur ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid la rab rib kyi mtshan ma skra shad 'dzings pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma snang bar gyur pa de lta bur ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The characteristic of the dependent should be seen as like that.üîΩJust as the effect, the appearance of the signs of a hairnet, etc., appears to one whose eyes are affected by the cause of an eye disease,üîΩso the effect, the appearance of the signs of things, appears to one whose mind is affected by the cause of the latent impressions of the clinging to things.

original: dper na mig 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu rab rib gang gi mig la yod pa de la 'bras bu skra shad 'dzings pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dag snang ba dang 'dra bar dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags sems 'khrul par byed ba'i rgyu kun
analyzed: dper na mig 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu rab rib gang gi mig la yod pa de la 'bras bu skra shad 'dzings pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dag snang ba dang 'dra bar dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags sems 'khrul par byed ba'i rgyu kun
translated: The characteristic of the dependent is the appearance of the signs of things that are false, like the appearance of the signs of a hairnet, etc., to one whose eyes are affected by the cause of an eye disease.üîΩThe characteristic of the dependent should be seen as like that.üîΩJust as the effect, the appearance of the signs of a hairnet, etc., appears to one whose eyes are affected by the cause of an eye disease, so the effect, the appearance of the signs of things, appears to one whose mind is affected by the cause of the latent impressions of the clinging to things.

original: @99a * // brtags pa'i mtshan nyid gang gi rgyud la yod pa de la 'bras bu gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'khrul pa'i dngos po dag snang ba de ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: @99a * // brtags pa'i mtshan nyid gang gi rgyud la yod pa de la 'bras bu gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'khrul pa'i dngos po dag snang ba de ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The characteristic of the dependent is the appearance of the signs of things that are false, like the appearance of the signs of a hairnet, etc., to one whose eyes are affected by the cause of an eye disease.

original: sngar kun brtags pa'i skabs su rgyus 'bras bu ston te zhes smos pa ni 'khrul pa'i rgyus ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brdar btags pa ste /
analyzed: sngar kun brtags pa'i skabs su rgyus 'bras bu ston te zhes smos pa ni 'khrul pa'i rgyus ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brdar btags pa ste /
translated: Previously, in the section on the imagined, it was said that the cause teaches the result. The cause of error is the imagined, i.e., the entity or the particular that is imagined by names and signs.

original: gnyi ga kun brtags pa nyid do //
analyzed: gnyi ga kun brtags pa nyid do //
translated: Both are the imagined.

original: 'bras bu 'di ni 'khrul pa'i dngos por snang ba gzhan gyi dbang yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'di ni 'khrul pa'i dngos por snang ba gzhan gyi dbang yin te /
translated: This result is the relative, which is the appearance of the entity of error.

original: de ni phyi rol gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni phyi rol gyi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the characteristic of the relative, which is endowed with the purpose of the external example.

original: de'i 'og tu nang gi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu nang gi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: After that, the meaning of the words, etc., should be explained, teaching the characteristic of the reality that is endowed with the purpose of the internal example.

original: de la nang gi dpe zhes bya ba ni nang gi mig yongs su dag pa'i spyod yul ma nor ba nyid dpe'o //
analyzed: de la nang gi dpe zhes bya ba ni nang gi mig yongs su dag pa'i spyod yul ma nor ba nyid dpe'o //
translated: Therein, the so-called internal example is the unmistaken domain of the completely purified eye. It is the example.

original: dpe de'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dpe de'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The explanation of the definition of the Dharma that possesses the purpose of that example is the explanation of the definition of the consummate Dharma that possesses the meaning of that example.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in consideration of that explanation,üîΩthe following is stated:

original: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste /
translated: The source of good qualities is as follows.

original: dper na skyes bu gang zag de nyid kyi mig yongs su dag cing mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa dang bral bar gyur pa na /
analyzed: dper na skyes bu gang zag de nyid kyi mig yongs su dag cing mig la rab rib kyi skyon chags pa dang bral bar gyur pa na /
translated: For example, when the eyes of that very person are completely pure and free from the fault of eye disease,

original: mig de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi spyod yul ma nor ba'i spyod yul de lta bur ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: mig de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi spyod yul ma nor ba'i spyod yul de lta bur ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the nature of those very eyes is the unmistaken object of experience. The consummate characteristic should be viewed in that way.

original: dper na mig 'khrul pa'i rgyu rab rib kyi skyon dang bral ba'i mig ma 'khrul pa'i spyod yul ma nor ba dang 'dra bar sems 'khrul pa'i rgyu kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i gnas gyur pa yang dag pa'i shes pa'i yul de bzhin nyid ni yongsüîΩsu grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: dper na mig 'khrul pa'i rgyu rab rib kyi skyon dang bral ba'i mig ma 'khrul pa'i spyod yul ma nor ba dang 'dra bar sems 'khrul pa'i rgyu kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i gnas gyur pa yang dag pa'i shes pa'i yul de bzhin nyid ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: For example, just as the object of a non-mistaken eye, free from the fault of the eye disease that is the cause of an eye-illusion, is unmistaken, so the object of the authentic cognition, the transformation free from the cause of the mind‚Äôs illusion, the imagined nature, is the reality, the consummate nature.

original: de ni nang gi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni nang gi dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the consummate nature, which has the purpose of the inner example.

original: de'i 'og tu mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: After that, the explanation of the characteristic of the dharma, which has the purpose of the example of the non-concentrated stage, should be explained, such as the meaning of the words and so on.

original: de la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe zhes bya ba ni shel dang / tshon la sogs pa sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi dngos po nyid dpe'o //
analyzed: de la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe zhes bya ba ni shel dang / tshon la sogs pa sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi dngos po nyid dpe'o //
translated: Therein, the so-called example of the non-concentrated stage is an external entity, because it is not counted as a sentient being, such as a crystal, a dye, and so on.

original: dpe de'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi @99b mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa kun brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang / yongs su grub pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: dpe de'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi @99b mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dpe de'i don dang ldan pa kun brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang / yongs su grub pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa gang yin pa de /
translated: The explanation of the characteristics of the phenomena that are associated with the purpose of that example is the explanation of the three characteristics of the imagined, the dependent, and the real, which are associated with the meaning of that example.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that,üîΩthe following is taught:

original: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste /
translated: The source of good qualities states:üîΩFor example, just as a crystal is clear,

original: dper na shel bzhin du gsal pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: dper na shel bzhin du gsal pa ni zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and so forth, up to

original: gser du log par 'dzin pas kyang sems can rnams rnam par rmongs par byed do zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
analyzed: gser du log par 'dzin pas kyang sems can rnams rnam par rmongs par byed do zhes gsungs pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
translated: because of the misapprehension of gold, sentient beings are also confused.

original: dpe de dag gis mtshon pa'i don ni 'og nas mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa nyid yin par sbyar ro //
analyzed: dpe de dag gis mtshon pa'i don ni 'og nas mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa nyid yin par sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning that is illustrated by those examples is applied to the explanation of the characteristics of the phenomena that are associated with the purpose of the clear realization.

original: dpe de dag kyang rnam par rig pa tsam las ma gtogs pa phyi rol gyi dngos po gzhan med mod kyi 'jig rten la grags pa'i dbang du mdzad nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: dpe de dag kyang rnam par rig pa tsam las ma gtogs pa phyi rol gyi dngos po gzhan med mod kyi 'jig rten la grags pa'i dbang du mdzad nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe zhes gsungs te /
translated: Although those examples are only consciousness only and there is no external object, they are called examples of the level of nonequipoise, from the perspective of what is renowned in the world.

original: de ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the definition of phenomena that possesses the purpose of the example of the level of nonequipoise.

original: dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: dpe'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
translated: The explanation of the meaning of the words and so on of the definition of phenomena that possesses the purpose of the example has been completed.

original: // / de'i 'og tu mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / de'i 'og tu mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Next, the meaning of the words and so on of the definition of phenomena that possesses the purpose of the accomplishment should be explained.

original: mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon par bsgrub pa'i don dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon par bsgrub pa'i don dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of the Dharma that is endowed with the purpose of realization is the teaching of the three characteristics of the Dharma that is endowed with the purpose of realizing the three doors of liberation.

original: de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po ngag mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid gsum la brten nas rnam par gzhag ste /üîΩkun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid la brten nas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po ngag mngon par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid gsum la brten nas rnam par gzhag ste / kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid la brten nas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The three doors of liberation are established in dependence on the three characteristics of the realization of the Dharma.üîΩThe door of liberation that is emptiness is established in dependence on the imagined characteristic.

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la brten nas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la brten nas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The door of liberation that is wishlessness is established in dependence on the other-dependent characteristic.

original: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la brten nas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa la mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la brten nas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa la mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag go //
translated: On the basis of the characteristic of the consummate, the establishment of the gate of liberation that is signlessness is presented.

original: de la dang por rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa @100a * //
analyzed: de la dang por rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa @100a * //
translated: With regard to that, first, the purpose of the establishment of the gate of liberation that is emptiness is the teaching of the characteristic of the imputed.

original: bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: bshad par bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the words and so on are to be explained.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni kun brtags pa'i chos bdag med par rab tu phye ba yin la /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni kun brtags pa'i chos bdag med par rab tu phye ba yin la /
translated: The gate of liberation that is emptiness is the disclosure of the selflessness of imputed phenomena.

original: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pas stong pa nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pas stong pa nyid yin pas na /
translated: Also, the characteristic of the imputed is emptiness because it is the lack of an entityness of character.

original: nges ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: nges ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: Therefore, the establishment of the gate of liberation that is emptiness is presented.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Hence, in terms of teaching that,

original: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste /
translated: the root text says, ‚ÄúThe source of good qualities is as follows.‚Äù

original: 'di lta ste dper na shel shin tu gsal ba nor bu rin po che aan darnyil la sogs pa log par 'dzin pa de lta bu ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dzin par blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs te /

translated: For example, the grasping of the relative pattern as the imagined pattern should be seen as like the grasping of a very clear crystal, such as a cat‚Äôs eye gem, as a jewel.

analyzed: de la tshig dang pos ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags sems 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la glo bur bar gnas pa bstan to //
translated: In this passage, the first sentence shows that the habit-energy of attachment to things since beginningless time, which is the cause of the confusion of mind, is adventitious to the store consciousness.

original: tshig 'og mas ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du mngon par zhen par byed pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa bstan te /
analyzed: tshig 'og mas ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du mngon par zhen par byed pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa bstan te /
translated: The next line indicates the imagination of what is unreal, which causes one to conceive the imaginary name for the dependent sign.

original: rtog pa de dngos ni gzhan gyi dbang yin pas kun brtags pa'i skabs 'dir mi sbyar gyi /
analyzed: rtog pa de dngos ni gzhan gyi dbang yin pas kun brtags pa'i skabs 'dir mi sbyar gyi /
translated: Since the imagination is actually the dependent nature, it is not applied in this section on the imaginary nature.

original: des gzung zhing mngon par zhen par bya ba dngos po la glo bur ba'i ming du btags pa gang yin pa de 'dir gzung ste /
analyzed: des gzung zhing mngon par zhen par bya ba dngos po la glo bur ba'i ming du btags pa gang yin pa de 'dir gzung ste /

original: de gnyis ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: de gnyis ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /

original: de ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin tsam du zad kyi phyi nang gi dngos po'i ngo bo nyid gang yang ma yin pa glo bur ba yin pas de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin tsam du zad kyi phyi nang gi dngos po'i ngo bo nyid gang yang ma yin pa glo bur ba yin pas de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa
translated: It is merely the cause of error and the nature of error, and since it is adventitious, it is not the reality of internal and external things. Since it is adventitious, it has the purpose of accomplishing the door of liberation of emptiness.

original: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching on the imaginary nature.

original: de'i 'og tu rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Next, the meaning of the words of the explanation of the dependent characteristic that has the purpose of accomplishing the liberation gate of wishlessness should be explained.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni khams gsum pa la mi smon bas rab tu phye ba yin la /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni khams gsum pa la mi smon bas rab tu phye ba yin la /
translated: The liberation gate of wishlessness is distinguished by not aspiring for the three realms.

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid kyang khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las @100b byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na des ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid kyang khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las @100b byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na des ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: Since the dependent characteristic is also the nature of the mind and mental factors of the three realms, it is the establishment of the accomplishment of the liberation gate of wishlessness.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in terms of teaching that,

analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas 'di lta ste /
translated: it is said: ‚ÄúThe source of qualities is like this.

original: dper na shel shin tu gsal ba de nyid lta bur ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dper na shel shin tu gsal ba de nyid lta bur ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: For example, the dependent characteristic should be seen to be like a very clear crystal.‚Äù

translated: Therefore, it is taught that the dependent nature has the purpose of accomplishing the door of liberation of wishlessness.

original: de'i 'og tu rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: After that, the meaning of the words and so on of the teaching on the characteristic of the perfected nature, which has the purpose of accomplishing the door of liberation of signlessness, should be explained.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa mtshan ma thams cad bsal bas rab tu phye ba yin la /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa mtshan ma thams cad bsal bas rab tu phye ba yin la /
translated: The door of liberation of signlessness is distinguished by the transcendence of suffering, which is the elimination of all signs.

original: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid don dam pa mtshan ma thams cad bsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na des ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par gzhag pa ste /

translated: The characteristic of the consummate is the suchness of phenomena, the nature of the ultimate, which is the elimination of all signs. Therefore it is the establishment of the accomplishment of the signless gate of liberation.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Thus, in terms of teaching that, the sutra says,

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na shel shin tu gsal ba de nyid nor bu rin po che aan darnyil la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid der rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang / ther zug ther zug gi dus su yongs su ma grub cing ngo bo nyid med pa de lta bur ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid de kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid der rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang /
translated: For example, a very clear crystal is not established as the characteristic of a sapphire or any other jewel at all times and always, and it has no essence.

translated: The characteristic of the perfected should be seen as the non-establishment and the unreality of the constructed in the unconstructed.

original: yongs su grub pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de nyid der yongs su ma grub cing ngo bo nyid de kho nas ngo bo nyid med pa chos bdag med pa de bzhin nyid rnam par dag
analyzed: yongs su grub pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de nyid der yongs su ma grub cing ngo bo nyid de kho nas ngo bo nyid med pa chos bdag med pa de bzhin nyid rnam par dag
translated: The perfected is the imagined characteristic of the constructed, the sign of the constructed, which is the domain of conceptualization. It is the non-establishment of that as that, and the unreality of that as that. It is the objective selflessness, the suchness, the pure object of observation of the liberation door signlessness.

original: pa'i dmigs pa yin pas na de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang @101a * //üîΩldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i dmigs pa yin pas na de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang @101a * // ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the teaching of the characteristic of the perfected, which has the purpose of accomplishing the liberation door signlessness.

analyzed: mngon par bsgrub pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /
translated: The meaning of the words of the teaching of the characteristic of the Dharma, which has the purpose of accomplishment, has been explained.

original: // / de'i 'og tu thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /

analyzed: de la mtshan nyid gsum po dag ni dngos po lnga la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur te /

analyzed: mtshan ma dang ming la brten nas ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so //
translated: Based on signs and names, one knows the imagined characteristic.

original: rnam par rtog pa la brten nas ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la brten nas ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so //
translated: Based on conceptualization, one knows the other-dependent characteristic.

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa dang de bzhin nyid la brten nas ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa dang de bzhin nyid la brten nas ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so //
translated: Based on right knowledge and suchness, one knows the perfected characteristic.

original: de la dang por mtshan ma dang ming la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /

translated: First, the method of understanding the imagined reality, which is endowed with the purpose of being understood in dependence on signs and names, will be explained.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,

analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas de la mtshan ma dang 'brel pa'i ming la brten nas kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes bya ba gsungs te / mtshan ma ni rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas 'du byed kyi mtshan ma ste /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIn dependence on names connected with signs, the imagined reality is understood.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Signs are the imagined reality that is the object of conceptualization, the sign of compositional activity, which is the dependent reality.

original: ming ni mtshan ma de la ji tsam du rjes su tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brdar rnam par gzhag pa ste /üîΩkun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: ming ni mtshan ma de la ji tsam du rjes su tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brdar rnam par gzhag pa ste /üîΩkun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Names are the imagined reality that is the designation of the entity or attribute of that sign, in order to impute it in some way.

original: de yang gnas med pa la ming dang gdags su mi rung bas mtshan ma'i gnas la ming du 'dogs par byed pa ni mtshan ma dang 'brel pa'i ming zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yang gnas med pa la ming dang gdags su mi rung bas mtshan ma'i gnas la ming du 'dogs par byed pa ni mtshan ma dang 'brel pa'i ming zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Since it is not suitable to name or designate what does not exist, naming is done in relation to the basis of characteristics.

original: ji tsam du ming dang mtshan ma la ming du gdags pa de nyid kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de'i phyir ming la brten nas ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ji tsam du ming dang mtshan ma la ming du gdags pa de nyid kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de'i phyir ming la brten nas ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes gsungs te /
translated: Since the imputation of a name to a name and a characteristic is the imagined characteristic, therefore, it is said that one should understand the imagined characteristic in dependence on names.

original: de ni mtshan ma dang ming la brtan nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs @101b kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni mtshan ma dang ming la brtan nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs @101b kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches the imagined characteristic, which has the purpose of being the means by which one comes to understand it in dependence on characteristics and names.

original: de'i 'og tu rnam par rtog pa la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rnam par rtog pa la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: After that, the meaning of the words of the dependent characteristic, which has the purpose of being the means by which one comes to understand it in dependence on conception, should be explained.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa la brten nas ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa la brten nas ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIn dependence on the adherence to the imagined reality in the dependent reality, the dependent reality is fully known.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du rnam par rtog pas mngon par zhen pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du rnam par rtog pas mngon par zhen pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ste /
translated: The adherence to the imagined reality in the dependent reality is the imagination of what is unreal, the mind and mental factors of the three realms, which is the adherence to the imagined reality in the dependent reality through the imagination of the name in the dependent reality.

original: ji srid du mtshan ma la ming du rnam par rtog pas mngon par zhen pa de srid du gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin pas na de'i phyir mngon par zhen pa la brten nas gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: ji srid du mtshan ma la ming du rnam par rtog pas mngon par zhen pa de srid du gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin pas na de'i phyir mngon par zhen pa la brten nas gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes gsungs te /
translated: As long as there is the adherence to the imagination of the name in the sign, there is the dependent reality. Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúIn dependence on the adherence, the dependent reality is fully known.‚Äù

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the other-dependent characteristic, which has the purpose of the means of understanding in dependence on conceptualization.

original: de'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i shes pa dang de bzhin nyid la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i shes pa dang de bzhin nyid la brten nas rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: After that, the explanation of the thoroughly established characteristic, which has the purpose of the means of understanding in dependence on correct knowledge and suchness, should be explained, such as the meaning of the words and so on.

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that, it is said:

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa med pa la brten nas ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa med pa la brten nas ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In dependence on the absence of the conception of the imagined characteristic in the other-dependent characteristic, the thoroughly established characteristic is understood.

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du mngon par zhen pa med pa ni gnas gyur pas bsdus pa yang dag pa'i shes pa de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du mngon par zhen pa med pa ni gnas gyur pas bsdus pa yang dag pa'i shes pa de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The absence of the imagined name that is attached to the sign of the other-dependent is the thoroughly established nature.

original: gang gi tshe gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du yang dag par shes pas mngon par zhen pa med pa de'i tshe yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i ming du yang dag par shes pas mngon par zhen pa med pa de'i tshe yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
translated: When one does not have the attachment to the imagined name that is attached to the sign of the other-dependent through correct knowledge, then it is the thoroughly established nature.

original: de'i phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa la brten nas yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes gsungs te /üîΩde ni yang dag pa'i shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid la brten nas rab tu shes @102a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa la brten nas yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes so zhes gsungs te / de ni yang dag pa'i shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid la brten nas rab tu shes @102a * //
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúone should know the thoroughly established nature in dependence on the absence of attachment.‚Äù

original: par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: thabs kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad zin to /

analyzed: // / de'i 'og tu rtogs pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste / rtogs pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid gsum rtogs ba la brten nas shes bya'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhing de rtogs pa'i 'bras bu phan yon gyi dgos pa thob cing mkhas par
translated: Next, the meaning of the words of the teaching of the definition of the Dharma that has the purpose of realization should be explained.üîΩThe teaching of the definition of the Dharma that has the purpose of realization is the teaching of the three natures that has the meaning of being endowed with the purpose of the benefit that is the result of realizing all aspects of the thing that is to be known, and being endowed with the purpose of the benefit that is the result of realizing that, which is the designation of being learned.

original: 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i don dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i don dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the teaching of the three natures that has the meaning of being endowed with the purpose of the benefit that is the result of realizing all aspects of the thing that is to be known, and being endowed with the purpose of the benefit that is the result of realizing that, which is the designation of being learned.

original: de la shes bya'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i chos dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos dang / rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnam pa thams cad do //

translated: The nature of the non-existence of the characteristic is the non-existence of the duality of apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: de yang kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa la brten nas ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rtogs par 'gyur ro //üîΩgzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa la brten nas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa la brten nas ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rtogs par 'gyur ro // gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa la brten nas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature of the imagination of what is unreal is the existence of the mere representation of that.üîΩThe perfected nature is the existence and non-existence of that.üîΩThe three natures are the nature of the non-existence of the characteristic, the nature of the imagination of what is unreal, and the perfected nature.üîΩThe nature of the non-existence of the characteristic is the non-existence of the duality of apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa la brten nas ni rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa la brten nas ni rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature of the imagination of what is unreal is the existence of the mere representation of that.üîΩThe perfected nature is the existence and non-existence of that.

original: de la dang por mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rtogs par gyur pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la dang por mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rtogs par gyur pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /

original: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,

original: yon tan 'byung gnas de la byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams kyi gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na mtshan nyid med pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rabüîΩtu shes so zhes bya ba gsungs te ;

translated: The dependent characteristic of phenomena refers to the sign of compositional phenomena, the basis of the imagined characteristic, the domain of conceptual thought.

original: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta pa bzhin du rab tu shes na zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du rjes su tha snyad gdags @102b pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brda rnam par gzhag pa de glo bur bar shes
analyzed: kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta pa bzhin du rab tu shes na zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du rjes su tha snyad gdags @102b pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dam bye brag tu ming dang brda rnam par gzhag pa de glo bur bar shes
translated: If one knows the imagined reality just as it is, one knows that the nature or the particular is established as a name and conventional symbol just for the sake of subsequent designation.

original: na'o // mtshan nyid med pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra bar bden pa gnyi
analyzed: na'o // mtshan nyid med pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra bar bden pa gnyi
translated: One knows that the reality of the non-existence of characteristics just as it is, because that very imagined reality is devoid of reality by reason of its non-existence of nature, and one knows that it is completely non-existent in both of the two truths, like a flower in the sky.

original: gar gtan med par shes shing chos brtags pa'i phyir chos bdag med pa rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gar gtan med par shes shing chos brtags pa'i phyir chos bdag med pa rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /

analyzed: de ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rtogs par 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dang ldan pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,

original: yon tan 'byung gnas de la byang chub sems dpas gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes byaüîΩba gsungs te /

translated: it is said: ‚ÄúIf bodhisattvas know the dependent characteristic correctly and in its entirety, they will know the phenomena characterized by affliction correctly and in their entirety.‚ÄùüîΩIf they know the dependent characteristic correctly and in its entirety, they will know the phenomena characterized by affliction correctly and in their entirety.

original: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa khams gsum pa'i sems
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa khams gsum pa'i sems

translated: and as mind and mental factors.üîΩThe knowledge of the characteristics of the dharmas of defilement is the knowledge of the dependent on others as it is in reality, as it is included in the dependent origination in the order of arising, as it is endowed with the characteristics of defilement by action and passion, and as it is the arising of the unreality of own-being and the unreality of the ultimate, and as it is existent in the superficial reality like a magical creation.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid de nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung bas bsdus pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /

translated: The knowledge of the dependent on others as it is in reality is the knowledge of the characteristics of the dharmas of defilement.üîΩThe knowledge of the characteristics of the dharmas of purification is the knowledge of the perfected as it is in reality, as it is included in the dependent origination in the reverse order, as it is endowed with the characteristics of purification by action and passion, and as it is the non-arising of the unreality of own-being and the reality of the ultimate, and as it is existent in the superficial reality like a magical creation.üîΩThe knowledge of the characteristics of the dharmas of purification is the knowledge of the perfected as it is in reality.

original: las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa dang don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa sgyu ma byas pa dang 'dra bar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid du yod par shes shing gzhan gyi dbangüîΩthams cad sdug bsngal bar rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /

original: de'i 'og tu rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rtogs par 'gyur ba'i dgos pa @103a * //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rtogs par 'gyur ba'i dgos pa @103a * //
translated: After that, the thoroughly established character, which has the purpose of realizing the phenomena characterized by purification, is taught.

original: dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: dang ldan pa yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i tshig gi don la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas / yon tan 'byung gnas de la byang chub sems dpas yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,üîΩit is said, ‚ÄúIf bodhisattvas know the thoroughly established character as it is, they know the phenomena characterized by purification as they are.‚Äù

original: gsungs te / yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa med pa /

analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyis chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs las bzlog pas bsdus pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'i byang chub

analyzed: kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad dang / stobs bcu la sogs pa che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nam mkha' dang 'dra bar don dam pa'i bden pa nyid du yod par shes shing rnam par grol ba thams cad bde bar rtogs par 'gyur ba

analyzed: phan yon gyi dgos pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar shes bya'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob cing mkhas par 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i

analyzed: de yang spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pas rab tu phye ba yin no //

analyzed: de'i phyir de bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Therefore, in order to teach that,
